mapper.sql: UUID, LOGIN_NAME, PWD, REAL_NAME, EMP_NO, ORG_ID, TELEPHONE, MOBILE, EMAIL, QQ, CREATE_TIME, STATUS, DELETE_FLAG, REMARK

sql.trim: and (DELETE_FLAG = 0 OR DELETE_FLAG IS NULL) and UUID = #{uuid} and LOGIN_NAME like '%'||#{loginName}||'%' and REAL_NAME like '%'||#{realName}||'%' and EMP_NO like '%'||#{empNo}||'%' and ORG_ID = #{orgId} and TELEPHONE like '%'||#{telephone}||'%' and MOBILE like '%'||#{mobile}||'%' and EMAIL like '%'||#{email}||'%' and QQ like '%'||#{qq}||'%' and CREATE_TIME = #{createTime} and STATUS = #{status} and REMARK like '%'|| #{remark}||'%' and (LOGIN_NAME like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' or REAL_NAME like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' or MOBILE like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' or EMP_NO like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' )

if.test: page != null and page.sort!=null and page.sort!=''
page == null or page.sort == null or page.sort == ''

mapper.update: update sys_operator set delete_flag = 1 where uuid = #{uuid}
mapper.select: select from sys_operator where login_name = #{value} and (delete_flag = 0 or delete_flag is null)
select p.code from sys_permission p, sys_role_permission rp, sys_operator_role ur where p.uuid = rp.permission_id and rp.role_id = ur.role_id and ur.OPERATOR_ID = #{value}

select u.* from sys_operator u where u.delete_flag != 1 and exists (select uuid from sys_operator_role r where r.OPERATOR_ID= u.uuid and r.role_id=#{roleId})
and u.REAL_NAME like '%'||#{realName}||'%' and u.LOGIN_NAME like '%'||#{loginName}||'%' and (u.REAL_NAME like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' or u.LOGIN_NAME like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' )

select u.qq from sys_operator u, sys_operator_role rr , sys_role r where rr.OPERATOR_ID= u.uuid and rr.role_id = r.uuid and r.code='onlineServer' and r.role_name is not null and u.delete_flag != 1 and u.qq != ''
select org_name from sys_org where uuid=#{id}
mapper.update: update sys_operator set PWD = #{pwd} where uuid=#{uuid}
